author: Marcus Cho
title: Nike Unveils Patterned-Denim “Afro Punk Pack”
text:
Visit the original post to see all 3 images from this gallery. 
Brand: Nike
Model: Air Max 90, Air Huarache, Air Force 1 ’07 LV8
Key Features: Denim uppers, unique rainbow-patterned design stretching across the seams and mudguard areas on each pair. Finished with gum sole on the Huaraches and Air Max 90s, and an all-white midsole and outsole on the Air Force 1.
Release Date: Now available.
Price: $99 USD (Air Force 1), $115 USD (Huarache and Air Max 90)
Availability: Available at retailers such as atmos Tokyo. 
Editor’s Notes: This month has been all about the Air Max 1 , but that doesn’t mean Nike has forgotten to give one of its favorite models love – this rendition of the Air Max 90 is likely one of the most colorful we’ve seen yet, and that statement applies to the rest of the pack as well – they’ll be great statement pieces to add to any wardrobe. The pack has been touted as extremely limited, so be swift if you’re looking to grab a pair.
